here quote an ancient Greek fable . one winter's day , a farmhand found a snake frozen by the cold .这里用得着古代希腊的一段寓言：“一个农夫在冬天看见一条蛇冻僵着。
she told me , from now on my name will be Maria Gaal , a Roman Catholic , illegitimate daughter of a farmhand !她告诉我,从现在起我的名字,将玛丽亚加尔,一名罗马天主教,非婚生女儿的一名农民!

" Are you a good farmhand ? " the farmer asked him ., " 你是个干农活的好手吗 ? " 农场主问他.

entry.def: A farmhand is a person who is employed to work on a farm.

means.word_mean: 1. a hired hand on a farm

auth_sentence.content: Her baby hungrily suckled her udders as a farmhand tiptoed around her and started milking.
